metadata.name: Bleakness
metadata.description:
Depiction of the world without freedom. The world without happiness or colour. A bleakness that represents a society that turned its back on freedom.

-----------------------
This piece is created for the "AI Is Freedom" exhibition at the Mecenate Fine Art Museum in Rome, Italy from September 23rd - 29th, 2022.
